about_the_game:
There are many useful items in the Total experience set that will improve your game. This set will allow you to enjoy the possibilities that the store offers. You will have a large amount of supplies at your disposal, as well as a mount!

Please note that all items in the Total experience set cannot be stored in a warehouse, nor can they be transferred to another player.

Remember that you can only buy the starter kit once.

The package includes:

Experience Potion (24 hours) [NP] (1 piece)
Experience Potion (4 hours) [NP] (1 piece)
Experience Potion (1 hour) [NP] (1 piece)
Craftsman's Experience Potion (1 day) [NP] (1 piece)
Wealth Potion [NP] (5 pieces)
Craftsman's Potion (1 day) [NP] (1 piece)
7 days of premium account [NP] (1 pc)
Wanderer (1 piece)
Mechanical Spider Summoning whistle (1 piece)

You can get the purchased set in the "Gifts" menu of the in-game store.

name: Sphere 3 - Total experience
short_description: Total experience containsuseful items that will enhance your gameplay.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, French, Italian, German, Polish, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
